name: T.E. - The Extraterrestrial
description:
You are an extraterrestrial who has returned to planet earth in search of those candies that you liked so much 40 years ago, collect the 16 candies scattered throughout the forest and return to your planet!

CAUTION:

Every time you walk, run, jump, use powers, your energy will decrease. At the end of the game, the remaining energy will be your score for the Global Online Ranking.

Controls:

AWSD: Move Player
Mouse: Rotate Player
E: special powers
Space: Jump
Shift: Run

TIPS:

Follow the path of stones, and press E to light up the candies from time to time.Important: It's my first game and I've been learning blueprints for less than 1 month, I expect constructive feedback, that will encourage me to continue improving and learning more.

If the game is laggy change the graphics to medium or low

Tested on a Ryzen 2700x, RTX 2060, 16gb RAM
